content.raw:
Yes, this will be for sdformat9. This shouldn't affect Blueprint, but could affect Citadel if we choose to upgrade to sdformat9.

After we are happy with this PR, we can plan to make changes to the specification. The Pose frame semantics might want to make changes, in addition to the above suggestions.
content.html:
Yes, this will be for sdformat9. This shouldn't affect Blueprint, but could affect Citadel if we choose to upgrade to sdformat9.

After we are happy with this PR, we can plan to make changes to the specification. The Pose frame semantics might want to make changes, in addition to the above suggestions.
